preparation.raw_text:
1. Measure 6 g of Boron (B) using a precision scale. 
 2. Measure 4 g of Calcium (Ca). 
 3. Measure 2 g of Lithium (Li). 
 4. Measure 24 g of Nickel (Ni). 
 5. In a clean, dry container, combine all measured materials thoroughly using a spatula to ensure uniform distribution.
